name: GET_suppression-spam_reports
description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve all spam reports.**

start_time.description: The start of the time range when a spam report was created (inclusive). This is a unix timestamp.

end_time.description: The end of the time range when a spam report was created (inclusive). This is a unix timestamp.

limit.description: Limit the number of results to be displayed per page.

offset.description: Paging offset. The point in the list to begin displaying results.

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

$ul: **created**: A Unix timestamp that indicates when the recipient marked your message as spam.
**email**: The email address of the recipient that marked your message as spam.
**ip**: The IP address that the message was sent from.
